Package org.spongepowered.api.event.advancement

Interface CriterionEvent.Score.Revoke

All Superinterfaces:
AdvancementEvent, Cancellable, CriterionEvent, CriterionEvent.Revoke, CriterionEvent.Score, CriterionEvent.Score.Change, Event
Enclosing interface:
CriterionEvent.Score
public static interface CriterionEvent.Score.Revoke extends CriterionEvent.Score.Change, CriterionEvent.Revoke
Is called when the score of a ScoreAdvancementCriterion changes and results into revoking the criterion.
